import java.util.Scanner;

public class ques20d {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		System.out.println("enter rows");
		Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);
	int r=sc.nextInt();
	 int i, j, k=1;
	    for(i=0; i<r; i++)
	    {
	        for(j=0; j<k; j++)
	            System.out.print("* ");
	        k=k+2;
	        System.out.println();
	    }
		}
	}
